newsitem.title: FRANCE: Arthuis says Spain's EMU drive admirable.
newsitem.headline: Arthuis says Spain's EMU drive admirable.

text.p: Spain is making admirable efforts to ensure its economy is ready for European monetary union in 1999, French Finance Minister Jean Arthuis said on Tuesday.

He was speaking during a Franco-Spanish summit in this Mediterrean port city at which French President Jacques Chirac also on Monday praised Spain's drive to get into monetary union when it is first launched in 1999.
"Spain is making admirable efforts," Arthuis told Reuters.
Spain unveiled a tough deficit-cutting budget in September designed to reduce its public deficit to three percent of gross domestic product next year and guarantee Madrid a place in monetary union.
The Franco-Spanish talks, which started on Monday evening, were due to finish on Tuesday morning with a news conference scheduled for 1030 GMT.
